BOOST_FIXTURE_TEST_SUITE

Declares and registers a fixture used by all test cases under a test suite. Each test case in the subtree of the test suite uses the fixture. The class implementing the fixture should have the appropriate interface. As any fixture, it is possible to have test assertions in the fixture class.

See here for more details.
